name: Tripwire
description:
Tripwire is an action arcade game played by up to 2 players! Dodge and defeat deadly shapes with the tripwire that joins the 2 players. Do you have what it takes to survive a minute?

Controls: 
WASD and Arrow Keys to move each player
Playable with 1 or 2 players!

Made in 3 days for the One Minute Game jam #2
Theme: 2 PLAYERS
Restriction: make a game with gameplay LESS than a minute
I also decided to challenge myself with the previous jam's theme: WIRED

Art inspired by Squid Game ;) 🦑⭕🛆🔳🦑
SFX by https://kenney.nl/

Best played using Windows 10, in a Google Chrome browser
